1.content:
Your name is Timothy Walters. One day at school you black out. When you awake you realize you have shrunk to 3 inches tall. You decide to get help. You decide to seek help from your girlfriend, Lauren, she had always helped you before. You started walking to her desk still in doubt that this could happen. You finally arrived at Lauren's desk, it would be too hazardous to climb so you decide your best bet to get her attention is in her purse. You climb in and wait until the ideal moment. While waiting you fall asleep. When you awake you see Lauren's face staring right at you. "Is that you, Timothy?" she asks in utter amazement. You tell her what happened and after you finished Lauren was torn between giving you to one of your sisters, giving you to your ex-girlfriend, Casey who has known you longer than her, or keeping you for herself.

What does Lauren Decide to do?
1.title: The Beginning of the End

14.content:
"You know? Casey would know more about what to do. I'm going to give you to her." Lauren says. Your heart squeezes tight. You don't know how Casey will react after you dumped her. info.brief_description: One day at school you suddenly shrink now the female students want to eat you. Please Add.
info.description:
Your name is Timothy Walters, you are 14 years old; one day while at school you suddenly black out. When you awake you find yourself shrunk down to 3 inches. You now must seek help. You have a girlfriend Lauren, 16 years old, two sisters, Kristen, 17 years old, and Hannah, 15 years old. Your mom's name is Cynthia and she hates you. You also have an ex-girlfriend Casey, 15 years old.

Everything is allowed EXCEPT

1. Unbirthing
2. One line entries
3. More than one male character in the story, you.
4. Really teriible grammer and spelling

Remember

1. Timothy must either get eaten or crushed, hopefully eaten.
2. All entries must be in second person (you went to get help).
3. No males allowed except you

That's it. Please add and have fun!!
